com.xrtb.bidder

Class CampaignProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.bidder.CampaignProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<SelectedCreative>

    public class CampaignProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<SelectedCreative>
    CampaignProcessor. Given a campaign, process it into a bid. The CampaignSelector creates a CampaignProcessor, which is given a bid request and a campaign to analyze. The CampaignSelector creates one CampaignProcessor for each Campaign in the system. The Selector creates Future tasks and calls the processor. The call() method loops through the Nodes that define the constraints of the campaign. If all of the Nodes test() method returns true, then the call() returns a SelectedCreative object that identifies the campaign and the creative within that campaign, that the caller will use to create a bid response. However, if any Node test returns false the call() function will return null - meaning the campaign is not applicable to the bid.
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul
